description.narrative: The Project “Support to Country Coordinating Mechanism (CCM) for 2018-2021” aimed to assist to the CCM to conduct its business by providing the necessary administrative, secretarial, communications, and logistical support.

participating-org.narrative: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS

activity-description.narrative: Conduct of CCM meetings in Astana

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Indicator 2.1 Number of CSOs that have the capacity to engage in critical development and crisis-related issues, disaggregated by women’s, youth, persons with disabilities, other excluded groups Output indicators: 1.1 Number of newly selected CCM members being trained and able to take part in the decision making process 2.1 Percentage of fully implemented CCM Oversight activities (CCM oversight visits, LFA briefings, Oversight Committee meetings)

comment.narrative: Country Coordinating Mechanism need for capacity building for the enhancement of the international cooperation

20 Newly selected CCM members are trained and able to take part in the decision making CCM Oversight Committee is established and CCM Oversight function fully implemented 100% of CCM activities were fully implemented
